title: what do u do?
body: when your support refuses to play support but actually plays a mid laner.. BADLY and feeds and then says , " oh well its just a game"? cant we just punch them in the nuts or something D: {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: i do that almost all the time but i dont feed, at least. on purpose.
nice name bro
Awk
Most midlaners can be very effective supports. What champion in particular was it?
face actually but unfortunately no not really thank rito for that
You don't think that girls can troll the same as guyz?

not if guys ask other guys to be their best man. women cant troll like that. btw when is your bachelor party? i might where something a little.... revealing?

LIKE THIS: {{item:2045}}
i assume the game your are talking about was where you had a lux support and she went 6-5-12 and that isnt feeding btw
or realize its just a game and try to enjoy it and not care too much

> [{quoted}](name=MrFawknSunshine ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=sQMss128,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-12T07:10:37.052+0000)
>

please leave this chat room thx

its not a chat room its a public form of threads

and its a video game meant for fun... win some lose some have fun that is the point of the game
but when you fun ruins others then we have a problem so as he said plz leave
but the support he is flaming about went 6-5-12 she didnt feed
i never saw him confirm it being that game did you?
if you look at history its the only game with a mage support which he lost and it was his last game played

She never grabbed a Sightstone though, and that was a 30 minute game.

She had enough gold for Morellonomicon and Lich Bane, but couldn't spare 800 for team vision.
As much as I support "enjoying a game as a game," if you queue up and get support, you should play as a support.
Par for the course in Bronze 2, from what I've seen. Mage support or not, most Bronze-rank players I see don't understand the value of vision.
be that as it may... i dont disagree support should have SS but he is flaming that she fed and that she did not do
yeah what he said! you tell em hunny! <3
Slow clap, after the game, Alt-F4 for 10 minutes, grab an ice cream from the fridge and watch some south park. Thats what you do m8
